title: BMW rolls out updated M 1000 RR bike at Rs 49 lakh
description: Luxury automaker BMW on Wednesday said it has launched a new version of M 1000 RR in the country with the price starting at Rs 49 lakh (ex-showroom). The deliveries for the same will begin in November 2023, it added.
